title: Newly Renovated Kentfield 3bed 2 bath
posting_body: <URL>
223 McAllister Ave, Kentfield Ca 94904
Walk or hop on a bike and get most places across Kentfield, Ross, Larkspur and Greenbrae.
Corte Madera Creek and Mount Tam are your back yard.
Bacich and Kent Middle School within less than a 5 minute walk from the home for easy entertainment if you have little ones.
Walk to Kentwoodlands Market for equator coffee or groceries.
Walk to Guesthouse for dinners.
Ride your bike to Bon Air, Phoenix Lake, Larkspur Landing, Downtown Ross or San Anselmo.
Unit lives like a home and is fully renovated.
Currently under construction and will be available in September.
Property Details
3 bedroom 2 bath duplex unit
- Main suite with on suite bathroom
- In unit laundry
- Highly rated Kentfield school district (Bacich, Kent Middle & Redwood High)
- 5 minute walk to Bacich and Kent Middle School, Kent Woodlands Market, Guesthouse and Corte Madera Creek trails
- Fully renovated: Kitchen, bathrooms, new flooring, windows and doors
- Inviting garden in the front and yard in the back
- 2 dedicated parking spaces in front of the home
- Coveted Kentfield Gardens neighborhood with family friendly gatherings: Halloween traditions including road closures for safe trick or treating
Move in, Utilities and Pets
- Available September 15th
- Water is paid for by the landlord as is garden maintenance.
All other utilities are the responsibility of the tenant
- Minimum 12 month lease
- $6,000 deposit
- Small pets may be accepted with additional deposits
